type: Tutorial Step - Load the User Profile

definition.text: Do you know who your referrer is? Does your referrer have a User Profile? How do you find and load the right profile? Those are all good questions!

paragraphs.text: Follow the guide on the right to find the answers!
I brought you to the Dummy profile mentioned in the guide to make it easier for you!

If the question "who is your referrer" has no good answer then feel free to declare one of your friends in the Community! By the way, notice that the profiles of Community Mods and Core Team members are loaded already!
